title: Betty Grier
author: Waugh, Joseph Laing
snippet: To her also thishas been a memorable day, for when we were driving down the Dalveen Passshe told me that never before had she seen a Caledonian train, and thather last memory of Traloss dated back to a Sabbath-school trip about theyear 1868.
